name: Luminescence (itch) (Haruudev)
description:
Luminescence is a psychological horror action platform game made by the team; Afonso Valente, José Barrrisco and Sofia Roberto. The game occurs in a very mysterious yet dark environment that is unfamiliar for the main character since the beginning of the game. Thus while trying to remember how and why they got there more life or death questions start being raised by the character as it progresses further in this disturbing endless maze. It is full of hostile creatures except one that offers help and provides resources for the player, but can they be trusted?

Controls: 

Shift/X - jump/interact

Control/Z - pick up/shoot

Space- drop

Arrow keys- move

Enter- start
